source.title: Neuromodulation of neuronal circuits: back to the future

confidence_rationale: Highlights degeneracy and context dependence, which weakens strict orthogonality claims while still allowing useful functional axes.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Neuromodulatory effects are circuit- and state-dependent with substantial degeneracy, making one-to-one function mappings unreliable.
mapping.ree_translation: Introduces a Q-017 caveat: control axes are operational abstractions and should permit overlap and context-dependent coupling.
mapping.mapping_caveat: This is partly disconfirming for strict orthogonality but not for pragmatic axis decomposition with coupling.
mapping.source_context: Review focused on circuit-level variability across systems and preparations.

confidence_components.notes: Useful counterweight against over-literal axis independence assumptions.
